Near the old well by the lighthouse,

from the direction of the graveyard,

Someone, please help me!

見た目が美しいだけに、もったいない話だね
どこかに遺跡を守っている
兄妹がいるって話を聞いたけどな――

You shouldn't approach the ruins in the 
forest out of mere curiosity. Rarely do 
people venture here, so it's a place where 
monsters can run rampant. It's a shame, 
especially since it looks so beautiful. 
I've heard there's a pair of siblings who 
protect the ruins somewhere, though.

Do you believe there's a hell in this world? 
I do—it's real, I've felt it myself. 
No matter the mission or the money offered, 
I never want to go back to that place again. 
Honestly, I'd rather be dead—ugh!

It wasn't even a particularly strange monster.
